class Bit_Test_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='test_bit', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['DMAttendanceStatus'] = [
                                        ['SKAttendanceStatusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKAttendanceStatusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AttendanceStatusSifCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AttendanceStatusSifDesc', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['PrimarySort', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SecondarySort', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'bool', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BusinessDesc', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AttendanceStatusGroup', 'string', 'no-op']                                                               
                                        ]


                                 

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMAttendanceStatus', self.schemas['DMAttendanceStatus'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAttendanceStatusId')



bit_test_object = Bit_Test_object()
